alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 3:09PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Elko County through 345 PM PDT... At 308 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Jarbidge to 6 miles southwest of Gibbs Ranch. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gibbs Ranch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
